item.title: Don't build another AI tool
item.description: A few words about the hype around ChatGPT and why many AI tools are likely to fail.

item.title: 12 months to learn German
item.description: At the end of 2021, I set the goal of learning German to a communicative level within next 12 months. Here is the summary.

Hi, I’m Oskar ðŸ‘‹ Since 2016, I have been running a small, family-owned trading business in the stainless steel equipment sector for the food industry. In my free time, I also build indie projects. I’ve never had an opportunity to learn good programming, so I take advantage of no-code and low-code tools that are available on the market. I use them every day, both in my company and in developing side-hustle businesses.

item.title: Projects
item.description: I list here both open and closed projects in which I have been involved.
